ing: 1/3 cup instant milk chocolate drink mix
3 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed
n: College Munchies (Edible Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookie Dough)
des: "In college, my roommate taught me how to make easy, cheap, edible cookie dough for those late-night cravings. They're delicious and can be baked to make chocolate peanut butter cookies!"
ins:
Combine sugar, peanut butter, and margarine in a large bowl; beat until creamy. Mix in chocolate drink mix and milk until blended. Mix in flour until dough comes together and is no longer sticky.
Roll dough into balls; transfer to a large plate lined with waxed paper. Store in the refrigerator.
